style.shading_rule: tonal values via hatch density only; no gradients

subject.pose: stack of individually wrapped slices with one slightly peeled open, resting on simple table surface
subject.extra_notes: evoke the tidy uniformity of mass-produced cheese through geometric cross-hatching; emphasize transparency of the wrapper using sparse line density; keep the look industrial yet hand-rendered.

renderer.prompt_prefix: Vintage engraving, single-ink white line art of stacked cheese slices, one wrapper peeled, on dark green #364D3A background, screen-print friendly, hatching and stipple shading only, no gradients, no text other than specified title and footer, no trademarks.
renderer.negative_prompt: no color other than white, no photography, no 3D rendering, no logos, no text other than title and footer, no brand marks, no drop shadows, no background scenery
